Html:
Hello,

 

I'm evaluating GMap for a commercial product.

One of our requirements is to support map rotation based on the angle of the direction the user is going to (bearing).

I've seen in one discussion (http://greatmaps.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=78708) this was being tested, but I can't find it in the source code available for download.

 

Any idea on what I am doing wrong?

 

Thanks!

Joao
check your link, i've posted there link with successful build & source, the wish is noted, but it's not my top priority to make it happen

What I meant was that it wasn't available in the official source.

Is there a problem in it for not being yet released?
'official' version is waiting volunteers for fork ;}

I'm sorry, but what do you mean?

Volunteers to test and apply the demo you published in the source?
..just kidding ;} ..there is code for rotation in wpf version, but there is no in windows forms version, and because in cf you can't do transformations, i wonder how we make it?
ok, windows forms now has integrated rotation

Does it solve the rotation problem on Windows Mobile? I have exactly the same problem as jsantos98 and don't really know how to solve it. I saw your code for Windowf Forms but can it be used in Mobile ?
compact framework doesn't support transformations, no easy fix
Any idea or tip how to solve it? Would it be to expensive for mobile processor if I wrote my own function to rotate screenshot of the map (some matrix calculations, I suppose) ?
i've no idea ;/
http://www.philippewechsler.ch/Tigre.php this may be help

actually there is better one http://www.isquaredsoftware.com/XrossOneGDIPlus.php

but i never tried it, need some spare time to test it

XrossOne limited 2D transformation, now all  modern navigational systems work in 3D and uses OpenGL ES http://nokiagadgets.com/2011/12/04/cloudgps-google-maps-google-satellite-virtual-earth-openstreetmap-video/  ,http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bFUoBQgMdSc
go ahead, make it so ;}
I'll try to do it:)
here my progress:) http://www.4shared.com/file/TMdFRFkS/3D_online.html
to bad i can't manage to download it, use http://www.4shared.com/ or whatever..
http://www.flashcomponents.net/component/christmas-3d-google-map-v2/preview/7736.html
what it has to do with mobile?
Hi, still no rotation for mobile?
